content: **knitted vest in drops alpaca bouclé and drops alpaca the piece is worked top down with european/diagonal shoulders v-neck and i-cord sizes xs - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #woodworkervest drops design pattern ab-169 yarn group c + a or d ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-200-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 0602 brown and use drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-200-200-200-250-250-300 g colour 607 brown **buttons** drops buttons no 716 4 items in all sizes **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 16 stitches in width and 20 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
